intro.content:
"LIONDAO NFT

Taiwan’s very first metaverse enterprise community with high quality holders and massive enterprise resources.

Corporate Innovation X Metaverse X Digital Transformation.

More than 95% are CEO or senior level managers across digital and traditional industries. In the future, additional metaverse and NFT developments will occur to create the first Social DAO with metaverse industry consensus and incubate MetaStar for future impact."

"Establish an enterprise metaverse college for driving cross-industry AMA exchanges and transformations, promote NFT application landings and interdisciplinary collaborations to maximize the landings of NFT applications! Build an enterprise community with consensus and influence."

"In the Web 3.0 era, industries must address the market by upgrading their brands, performing digital transformations, and adopting new business models based on community benefit, consensus, and sharing to establish a circular consumer ecosystem. This allows enterprise self-media to embrace new business models, build an enterprise new media creative platform, and venture together into the metaverse."

story.content:
I HEARD A VOICE IS CALLING US.
LOOK! THERE IS A GATE.
BUDDIES, LET'S FIND OUT.
HERE WE ARE, LIONDAO, A WHOLE NEW WORLD.

mint.title: mint liondao nft
mint.description:
Allow the limitless imagination of the metaverse to become the future!
New Future, new MetaStar.

intro.content:
"LIONDAO NFT

全台第一個元宇宙企業社群，持有者企業資源與含金量超高

企業創新X元宇宙X數位轉型

95%以上皆為CEO、高階經理人，橫跨數位與傳統產業，未來將有更多元宇宙與NFT發展交流，創造第一個元宇宙產業共識Social DAO，孵化未來具影響力的MetaStar"
"成立企業元宇宙學院，推動產業跨域 AMA 交流與轉型，推動NFT落地應用，以及跨領域合作，將 NFT 落地應用極大化！建構企業社群共識與影響力"
"Web 3.0 時代，產業面對市場皆要做品牌升級、數位轉型與產業新商業模式，社群共利、共識與共享，建立消費循環生態系，讓企業自媒體擁抱新商模，建立企業新媒體創作平台，一起飛行元宇宙"

story.content:
我聽到一個聲音在呼喚我們，
那裡有一道門，
夥伴們，讓我們一起去看看！

什麼...?
發生了什麼事情？
我們來了，LIONDAO，這是個全新的世界！
